reviewText: This guy can play his instrument.  You can watch him do it.  He doesn't teach you much.

Much like Peter Browne, P.J. Hernon knows his instrument backwards & forwards.

Short on explanation, but long on demonstration. Anyone looking to learn the Irish B/C button accordion will find plenty to do with this DVD. It'll keep you practicing.

In this DVD,P J Heron has giving great details and demonstrate step by step how to play the button accordion. I totally enjoy his teaching. A must have DVD for those want to learn to play button accordion. I would like to get copies of DVD of this nature for keys such as C, & D and others.
Tony
